contents.content: UNIT 01 求职准备 Job Hunting Preparation
Lesson 9 预约面试 Making an Appointment for the Interview
杰克和玛丽在谈论预约面试的重要性。

contents.title: 杰克：玛丽，这家公司不错，我很想去面试一下。
contents.answer: Jack: Mary, this company is pretty good. I really want to have an interview.

contents.title: 玛丽：你和这家公司预约面试了吗？
contents.answer: Mary: Have you made an appointment with this company?

contents.title: 杰克：还没有呢。面试还要预约吗？
contents.answer: Jack: Not yet. Do I have to?

contents.title: 玛丽：是的，在面试前做好预约很重要。
contents.answer: Mary: Yes, it's very important to make an appointment before the interview.

contents.content: 许多求职者在接到用人单位的面试通知时，想着自己的求职之路终于要看见光明了，必定是欣喜万分的，但是一定要将面试的时间、地点确定下来。此外，还要记下一些注意事项，做到万无一失。

contents.title: 杰克：为什么呢？
contents.answer: Jack: Why?

contents.title: 玛丽：如果你没有预约就去公司了，恰巧公司的面试人员在忙别的事情，就没空面试你了。
contents.answer: Mary: If you go to the company without appointment, the interviewers may happen to be busy with other things, and have no time to give you an interview.

contents.title: 杰克：是的，你说得对。
contents.answer: Jack: Yes, you are right.

contents.title: 玛丽：如果面试人员不在公司的话，你还是白跑一趟。
contents.answer: Mary: If the interviewers are not in the company, you will go there for nothing.

contents.title: 杰克：没错。我怎么没想到呢？
contents.answer: Jack: Sure. Why didn't I think of that?

contents.title: 玛丽：因此，你去面试前一定要和公司预约好。
contents.answer: Mary: So you should make an appointment in advance with the company for the interview.

contents.title: 杰克：那我该如何预约呢？
contents.answer: Jack: Then how can I make the appointment?

contents.title: 玛丽：你可以直接拔打公司的电话，确定面试的时间和地点。
contents.answer: Mary: You could directly call the company and arrange the time and place for the interview.

contents.title: 杰克：好的，我知道了。
contents.answer: Jack: Ok, I see.

contents.title: 玛丽：如果你预约成功了，就要准时参加面试。
contents.answer: Mary: If you succeed in doing that, you must attend the interview on time.

contents.content: 如果求职者同时预约了好几家公司的面试，最好用笔记本记录清楚各自的面试时间和地点及面试要带的材料，以免出错而失礼，导致错失求职机会。

contents.title: 面试前一定要做好预约工作。
contents.answer: You must make an appointment for the interview in advance.

contents.title: 我想打电话和那家公司预约面试的时间和地点。
contents.answer: I want to call that company to arrange the time and place for the interview.

contents.title: 我可以和您预约一下面试吗？
contents.answer: May I make an appointment with you for the interview?

contents.title: 我想跟您预约一下面试的时间和地点。
contents.answer: I wish to reserve the time and place of the interview with you.

contents.title: 我可以去公司参加面试吗？
contents.answer: Can I go to your company to have an interview?

contents.title: 请您给我一次参加面试的机会。
contents.answer: Please give me the chance to have an interview.

contents.title: 我今天下午到贵公司参加面试可以吗？
contents.answer: Is it OK for me to join in your company's interview this afternoon?

contents.title: 我明天有空，可以去参加面试。
contents.answer: I am free tomorrow and can take the interview.

contents.title: 我想跟您确定一下面试的时间和地点，可以吗？
contents.answer: I want to make sure of the time and place of the interview with you, may I?

contents.title: 很抱歉我忘记了面试的时间和地点，请您再说一遍好吗？
contents.answer: I am sorry, I have forgotten the time and place of the interview; could you tell me once again, please?

go there for nothing 白跑一趟
